text: The Thomas-Stetson Locomotive or North Pacific Coast Railroad #21 formerly the Bodega Locomotive #5 was a 4-4-0 type cab forward steam locomotive built in 1901 by the North Pacific Coast Railroad designed to pull both passenger trains and freight trains it operated until was scrapped in 1905 . It was a 1901 rebuild of the 1875 Baldwin built 4-4-0 type locomotive #5 the Bodega Locomotive which was a conventional steam locomotive that was wrecked and scrapped in 1897 .
title: Thomas-Stetson Locomotive
